title: The Advocate
occurrences: to accompany my youthful master, the advocate...
But then, I'm not the advocate.
Monsieur is an advocate of law, so monsieur is a maitre.
Ah, Maitre.! Richard Courtois. I'm the new advocate.
- Good God! - We haven't had a defense advocate since last summer.
I did not go through all this to become an advocate for pigs.
No, sir. They are outside the walls of the town. And I'm an advocate at law.
I do hope Maitre the Advocate will not capture me...
And I'm an advocate at law, and I'm telling you I do have the right.
Tell him the advocate is going back to the big city.
at the state's expense until a new advocate arrives as his counsel.
As advocate for the first porker...
